description: In a surreal field, a tiny man is perched on the stem of a giant daisy with a smiling face, spitting a stream of water at a second giant daisy with a distressed, angry face. Water splashes around the unhappy daisy's face, while the happy daisy seems oblivious to the interaction. The scene presents an absurd interaction between human and plant life, highlighting the futility and strangeness of the man's watering method and the daisies' human-like expressions.
